Package de.lases.control.backing

Class ScientificForumBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.ScientificForumBacking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ViewScoped @Named public class ScientificForumBacking extends Object implements Serializable
Backing bean for the scientific forum page.

    • isViewerEditor

      public boolean isViewerEditor()
      Check if the current viewer of the page is an editor of this forum. Based on users being compared by ids. (Might be different objects).
      Returns:
      true if viewer is a managing editor.
